item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 01‚Äì7.04.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 1‚Äì7.04.2019

Projects

ü§ùTokeny has partnered with global law firm DLA Piper to form the Digital Securities Alliance (DSA). As a compliance-focused organization, DSA will look to bridge the gap between tokenized securities and securities regulations in jurisdictions throughout the world.

‚öôÔ∏èMiami International Holdings and Templum entered into strategic partnership to list and trade digital securities on a fully regulated MIAX Exchange, which is to be developed. The joint venture will be SEC-registered and operated as a facility of an exchange owned by MIH and subject to SEC approval.

Regulation

üá∫üá∏United States Securities and Exchanges Commission FinHub has [published] (https://www.sec.gov/news/public-statement/statement-framework-investment-contract-analysis-digital-assets?hootPostID=7604b0fbb8f5d3e5ac775448e860b4e2)a framework to help market participants ascertain whether or not a digital asset is deemed to be an investment contract, and therefore a security, accompanied by official statement.

üôÖüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èAt the same time, SEC issued first no action letter regarding tokenization of digital asset by TurnKey Jet that is NOT a security.

üñåEU launched blockchain association to accelerate distributed ledger technology adoption. Its 105 founding members, including Ripple Labs, Consensys AG, and Bitfury, will support the development of interoperability of global standards as well as a transparent and inclusive model of governance.

Join Security Token Club: https://t.me/stoaccelerator

item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 25‚Äì31.03.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 25‚Äì31.03.2019

Projects

üá©üá™B√∂rse Stuttgart, Germany‚Äôs second-largest stock exchange, plans to collaborate with digital publisher Axel Springer and finanzen.net, the country‚Äôs popular online financial news site, to develop a trading platform powered by blockchain technology.

üá∑üá∫MMC Norilsk Nickel PJSC and its billionaire chief Vladimir Potanin are planning to launch several digital platforms, including a platform for commodities tokenization The world‚Äôs top palladium producer is in talks with Swiss authorities about issuing tokens by its Switzerland-based palladium fund.

üí∏Social trading/investment platform eToro has bought Firmo Network, a protocol for smart contracts for derivatives, for an undisclosed amount. ** The goal of the Firmo team will be to tokenize all assets on eToro.

Regulation

üá≠üá∞New statement by HK Security and Futures Commission: ‚ÄúPerson who markets and distributes Security Tokens (whether in Hong Kong or targeting Hong Kong investors) is required to be licensed or registered for Type 1 regulated activity (dealing in securities) under the Securities and Futures Ordinance. It is a criminal offence for any person to engage in regulated activities without a licence unless an exemption applies.‚Äù

Join Security Token Club: https://t.me/stoaccelerator

item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 18‚Äì24.03.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 18‚Äì24.03.2019

Main news

üè¶IBM is taking its banking clients a step closer to cryptocurrency. Announced Monday, six international banks have signed letters of intent to issue stablecoins, or tokens backed by fiat currency, on World Wire, an IBM payment network that uses the Stellar public blockchain. The network promises to let regulated institutions move value across borders‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääremittances or foreign exchange‚Ää‚Äî‚Äämore quickly and cheaply than the legacy correspondent banking system.

üá¨üáßSmartlands, an aspiring global platform for security token issuance, announced the acquisition of a major stake in Shojin Financial Services Limited (SFS)‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääa London-based company that in 2017 received an investment license from the British Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) allowing SFS to raise capital globally via crowdfunding.

Projects

ü§ùSecurity token platform Polymath [has partnered] (https://www.coindesk.com/polymath-seriesone-team-up-to-simplify-security-token-issuance)with digital securities fundraising platform seriesOne to offer an ‚Äúend-to-end‚Äù solution for security token issuance. Back in November, seriesOne partnered with South Korean crypto exchange Bithumb to launch a compliant security token exchange in the U.S.

ü§ùLeading community engagement firm AmaZix announced its latest partnership with Securitize, a compliance platform for the primary issuance and lifecycle management of digital securities on the blockchain.

Regulation

üìÉAmerican Bar Association released a major report on digital assets and cryptocurrency regulation. The 353-page document titled ‚ÄúDigital and Digitized Assets: Federal and State Jurisdictional Issues‚Äù provides definitions relevant to digital currency, domestic regulatory issues, and what international bodies and other countries are doing when confronted by the new technology.

Join Security Token Club: https://t.me/stoaccelerator

item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 11‚Äì17.03.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 11‚Äì17.03.2019

Main news

ü§ùDeutsche B√∂rse, Swisscom and Sygnum [entered into strategic partnership] (https://www.deutsche-boerse.com/dbg-en/media/press-releases/Deutsche-B-rse-Swisscom-and-Sygnum-enter-into-strategic-partnership-to-build-a-trusted-digital-asset-ecosystem-1507212)to build a trusted digital asset ecosystem. They will become shareholders in Daura tokenization platform.

üö¶DX.Exchange, an Estonia-based platform has opened its market to secondary trading of security tokens. The exchange now allows companies to list their security tokens previously issued on other platforms. Currently, the platform is functioning in a closed regime for some 8,000 pre-registered users.

Projects

üèπWith few announcements made, ConsenSys has been developing the Dauriel Network‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääa white label platform, that corporates, exchanges and custodians can use to issue and manage tokenized financial assets. As the team previously stated, the platform was found to be especially relevant on French market. Platform demo.

‚öôÔ∏èICON has announced its token standard, IRC16 to simplify the process of creating blockchain-based securities and tokenized assets

Regulation

üá∫üá∏The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission‚Äôs chairman Clayton has stated that Ethereum ¬´may not represent an investment contract under the Howey framework¬ª.

üá©üá™The German Ministry of Finance has recommended that the country recognizes blockchain-based securities as a legitimate form of financial instrument and regulate them as such.

Join Security Token Club: https://t.me/stoaccelerator

item.title: Announcing the launch of Evercity Lab‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääcustom blockchain development studio
item.description:
Global industry leaders have already started the transfer to blockchain infrastructure in order to increase efficiency and widen outreach by providing new products to their customers. Evercity Lab is designed to provide a variety of custom blockchain development services and white label platform solution to assist businesses in blockchain adoption, minimizing their costs and time to market, as well as raising transparency.

Our team consists of 20+ blockchain, UX/UI, full-stack developers and other specialists with profound market knowledge, offering a unique combination of blockchain development, fintech and legal expertise. Our leading team members include management level professionals of Polkadot, Parity and Simex.

The range of Evercity Lab services include smart contracts development & audit, blockchain development, mobile/web apps with blockchain integration, conducting Security Token Offerings (STO), and much more.

Download full presentation

The goal of Evercity Lab to help you stay at the forefront of the technological trend and gain an advantage over competitors.

We welcome businesses to apply for free blockchain consulting service to receive expert advice on blockchain implementation that will help to optimize your current processes.

Submit application: lab@evercity.io

item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 04‚Äì10.03.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 04‚Äì10.03.2019

Main news

üî•Corda Enterprise, R3‚Äôs blockchain platform has been chosen by SIX, one of Europe‚Äôs leading Financial Market Infrastructures, to provide the underlying blockchain technology for its digital asset listing, trading, settlement and custody service, SIX Digital Exchange (SDX).

Projects

ü§ùTokeny and Lition announced cooperation to tokenise securities and technically pilot a ‚Ç¨20 million syndicated loan for real-estate issued by VR Bank.

‚úÖCircle announced that it has closed the acquisition of US crowdfunding pioneer SeedInvest after the regulatory approval by FINRA.

Regulation

üáÆüá±Israel Securities Authority (ISA) recommended creating a platform to trade cryptocurrencies under enhanced regulation, which would allow companies to raise money by issuing digital tokens to investors.

item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 25.02‚Äì03.03.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 25.02‚Äì03.03.2019

Main news

üéäVertalo and Securrency signed joint agreement to tokenize $260M in fixed-Income generating real estate sssets in 2019 offered by Inveniam Capital. The deal will allow both fiat and cryptocurrency investors to fund institutional-quality tokenized assets. The 4-property offering will be the largest asset tokenization effort ever by far.

Projects

üí∞Hong Kong Leading Angel Investor Soul Capital has invested in InvestaCrowd‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääleading Singapore investment platform for digital security investment offerings with a Capital Markets Services License issued by the Monetary Authority of Singapore. InvestaCrowd is preparing the launch of a specialised STO exchange.

‚¨áÔ∏ètZERO announced that their long pending deal with GSR Capital has been downsized from $400 million to $100 million.

üáßüáßThe Barbados Stock Exchange has recently announced that they have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Toronto based Blockstation. This agreement will see Blockstation provide the exchange with the tools and capabilities to support digital securities.

üáßüá≤TribeOS has announced their successful application for the hosting of a Digital Securities offering. This approval was granted by the Bermuda Ministry of Finance, setting an important precedent.

item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 18‚Äì24.02.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 18‚Äì24.02.2019

Projects

üîÑSecurity Token company Templum announced that it is shifting from public to private blockchains. Enterprise software vendor Symbiont is building a private blockchain and smart contracts system that Templum will use for future security token offerings (STOs) by its clients.

üôãüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èPaysera will be the first company to issue its own security tokens via DESICO platform. The STO is scheduled for April 2019, and the issued tokenized securities will be made available to retail investors only.

üá±üáÆA private bank in Liechtenstein has established a cryptocurrency trading platform for institutional investors. Balzers-based Bank Frick will offer the service through its new subsidiary DLT Markets AG.

üö¶BaFin, Germany‚Äôs securities regulator, has given the green light to Bitbond‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääonline lending platform‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääto issue tokenized bonds.

üè°The new Fluidity/Propellr partnership FluidityFactora has launched a tokenized real estate project called FACTOR-805. The token represents a Brooklyn-based residential and retail construction project‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääinterestingly, investors can both purchase and receive payment in either $ or the Dai stable coin.

üï∂Tokenized fund 22x is now trading on Open Finance Network

item.title: STO Weekly Review by Evercity 11‚Äì17.02.2019
item.description:
STO Weekly Review by Evercity 11‚Äì17.02.2019

Main news

ü•ÅLuxembourg lawmakers have passed bill 7363 into law, facilitating the use of blockchain technology in financial services. The new law aims provide financial market participants with more transparency and legal certainty in regard to the circulation of securities with blockchain technology. The bill is also geared to make the transfer of securities more efficient by reducing the number of intermediaries.

üá¨üáßTokenMarket, a ‚ÄúGlobal investment platform‚Äù announced its intent to raise up to ¬£10 million in a security token offering (STO). Perhaps the most interesting aspect of the forthcoming STO is the fact that TokenMarket will be issuing the securities under the watchful eye of the UK Financial Conduct Authority. In July of 2018, TokenMarket was officially accepted by the FCA into their regulatory Fintech Sandbox. The FCA has been the trailblazer of the Sandbox concept‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääa process that has now been emulated in many jurisdictions around the world.

Projects

üè†Elevated Returns, the company behind the first tokenized real estate offering (Aspencoin), plans to tokenize $1.0 Billion of real estate assets using Securitize and the Tezos blockchain.

üí∏SPiCE VC has announced its investment in InvestaCrowd‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääa digital securities platform that operates under a licence given by the Monetary Authority of Singapore. With this investment SPiCE VC now has 10 projects in its portfolio: InvestaCrowd, Securitize, Saga, Slice, Graphpath, RNDR, Rox, Archax, IOB, Bakkt.

üôåüèªThe NEO Project‚Äôs ‚ÄúNEO Global Development‚Äù (NGD) group announced that it had formed a consortium to explore and understand the growing digital securities sector.
